interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ethique Quench Lightweight Solid Face Moisturizer Tube for Oily to Balanced Skin - Plastic-Free, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Eco-Friendly, 2.29 oz (Pack of 1)
Review Date: 2022/02/16
Store: Ethique
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ethique', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Unit Count': '2.29 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '3.54 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Quench Bar Solid Face Moisturiser', 'UPC': '810003557681'}
Review Text: Absolutely love the concept of this product. A balm that you can easily apply to your face without having to get your hands dirty AND biodegradable packaging. A sure yes please, or so you’d think. Upon opening, I found the packaging to be great. The push up concept was great as well. Innovative and a great selling point. It had no real smell to it when I opened it but about an hour after applying it to my face, you could start to smell what smelt like an old lotion that’s sat around since my mother’s childhood. It was almost dusty of a smell. It also felt a bit greasy/oily. My face does feel smoother though after whipping it off though. Really wish I could love this product.
Review Title: Love the concept but not the product
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Aubss 20Pcs Colors Gel Nail Polish Kit with Glossy & Matte Top Coat and 2Pcs Base Coat, Rainbow Colors Skin Tones Yellow Red Gel Polish for All Reason, Gel Nail Kit for Women Girls Christmas Gift

I love the variety of this set. I have 2 daughters but also many nieces and they love having nail salon parties. This set gives me not only the base and top coats but also a HUGE variety of colors to choose from. Polish goes on great and looks perfect!
Gorgeous colors!

Absolutely love the concept of this product. A balm that you can easily apply to your face without having to get your hands dirty AND biodegradable packaging. A sure yes please, or so you’d think. Upon opening, I found the packaging to be great. The push up concept was great as well. Innovative and a great selling point. It had no real smell to it when I opened it but about an hour after applying it to my face, you could start to smell what smelt like an old lotion that’s sat around since my mother’s childhood. It was almost dusty of a smell. It also felt a bit greasy/oily. My face does feel smoother though after whipping it off though. Really wish I could love this product.
Love the concept but not the product
profile:
User Summary:

- **Family-Oriented**: The user continues to prioritize products that can be enjoyed in social or family settings, particularly with daughters and nieces, emphasizing activities that foster bonding and fun.

- **Variety Preference**: A strong appreciation for diverse color options remains evident, highlighting the user’s value for creativity and choice in products.

- **Quality and Performance**: The user maintains a focus on high-quality items that perform well, as shown by their critical review of a recent purchase. They are discerning about product efficacy, particularly regarding textures and scents.

- **Nail Art Enthusiast**: The user’s passion for beauty continues with a strong interest in nail care and hosting nail salon parties, indicating ongoing engagement in creative self-care activities.

- **Gift Consideration**: The user values products suitable for gifting, reflecting a thoughtful approach when selecting items for others, aligned with family and social interactions.

- **Eco-Consciousness**: Recent interactions suggest an interest in eco-friendly and innovative products, indicating a growing awareness of sustainability in beauty and self-care choices.

Overall, the user profile reflects a creative, family-oriented individual who values quality, variety, and social experiences related to beauty and self-care while increasingly considering eco-friendly options in their selections.
